name: Piece | Endless Runing
description:
What Is That Game?
Its Just Endless Runing Game, Play When You Waiting Your Friend To Come Or Just Fun Its Up To You Whatever You Want, This is Just A Basic Endless Runining Game :)

How To Play?

Click Screen To Jump And Don't Touch The Spikes, They Are Dangerous Also
Have Jetpacks They Are Spawn Auto Grab Them And Fly!
Have Fun!
